body.name: VECELO Criss Cross Armless Office Desk Chair No Wheels Comfy Wide Fabric Padded, Modern Swivel & Height Adjustable for Home/Bedrood/Make Up, Grey
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 【Fashionable Armless Design】This criss cross chair blends comfort and style with a sleek, armless design. This desk chair no wheels allow easy pairing with any office or home decor for cozy and elegant.

【Multifunctional Linen Seating】Our cross leg chair with adjustable height (around 5 inches), 360-degree swivel, and a recline angle of 90-125 degrees offer versatile use in both home and office settings. Customize the office chair's height and recline tension for personalized comfort.

【Wide U-shaped Comfort】U-shaped seat and back design of this home office desk chairs conforms to the spine curve, release the pressure on the back and buttocks from the middle to the sides and promoting better posture. The widened seat allows comfortable sitting positions and relaxation.

【Comfort & Stable】The High-resilience foam-filled seat and back, skin-friendly fabric, and a sturdy black-painted metal base of the armless office chair ensure both comfort and stability. The comfy desk chair for bedroom supported by high-quality gas lift hold up to 350 pounds.

【Easy Assembly】All tools included, assembling the home office chair takes about 15 minutes. Enjoy the comfort and happiness this cross legged office chair bring to your office, study, bedroom, vanity, living room, dorm, or apartment.
body.description: Fabric material: LinenColor: GreyOffice chair leg material: MetalChair back inclination: 90-125 degreesBackrest size: 25.4*22*2.8in (64.5x56x7cm)Cushion size: 25.8*21.7*3.3in (65.5x55x8.5cm)Distance from seat cushion to ground: 17.3*22in (44-56cm)VECELO Notes:This armless desk chair are intended for home&office use only.For safety reasons, kids should not climb on or play with the product .Do not exceed the products’ weight limit.In your personal haven, behold our Armless Elegance—a chair that whispers comfort and style. Its criss-cross silhouette blends form and function, offering adjustable height, a 360-degree swivel, and a recline from 90 to 125 degrees. Envelop yourself in the Wide U-shaped Comfort, where ergonomic design meets resilient foam, skin-friendly fabric, and a sturdy base—supporting up to 350 pounds. Witness a 15-minute assembly, a choreography of elegance. Let this Fashionable Armless Design grace your space, a poetic union of chic allure and functional embrace—the lyrical heartbeat of your sanctuary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for cross legged sitters
reviews.reviewText: I've been seeing chairs like this all over social media and finally caved in a got one! This model is made with a linen/cotton like material and can be removed for easy washing.Assembly of the chair was pretty quick but I needed a bit of help to put the top and bottom parts together.After sitting on it for awhile for both work and gaming, I give it a stamp of approval.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The chair was very easy to assemble. I found it to be super comfortable with extra space for those of us who like to cross their legs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Received half of the parts
reviews.reviewText: I was very excited for this chair. It looks nice and for a great price. However, I received a box with only half of the parts. Be careful with this company.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the fabric. I am unable to tell if it is comfortable , no hardware in box to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This chair is HUGE
reviews.reviewText: Even an adult can sit criss cross on top of the chair. (See picture of how big it is compared to my whole arm)It’s super easy to put together and minimalistic which has made this really popular on social media. Made for a great gift for college dorm room

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE the criss cross style for WFH job!
reviews.reviewText: I have been eyeing the criss cross desk chairs for a bit of time now after seeing them trending on social media. I finally decided to pull the trigger, and honestly I don't know why I didn't get one sooner. It took me about 15 minutes to assemble by myself, and it seems very sturdy. I personally didnt want a rolling chair, so this style works great for my hardwood floors and children running around. This is ideal for work from home people, which I do! The chair is stylish, and I love the neutral color and linen material. Overall, the chair is very comfortable, swivels, and I love that I can freely move around while working. The chair can be adjusted depending on the height of the desk and has a nice padded seat. I am curious to see how the seat will hold up over time. So far, I am extremely impressed. This is such a great addition to my workspace. Highly recommend to others!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice chair!
reviews.reviewText: I like the light gray color, as it matches my bedroom furniture well. The button tufts look very classy and there is little back support, I added a pillow. The seat and backrest are very wide but fit well under my 31” wide desk. Assembly took a while and needed strong hands to complete. Overall, matches the price point well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The VIRAL chair !!
reviews.reviewText: The viral criss cross apple sauce chair!! So easy to put together & cute. CAT APPROVED ~
